A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If I had never seen Star Wars then I would have thought it to be a pretty good sci fi film that I would never quite understand. The visual fx were gorgeous. However\, as a Star Wars fan and a follower of the Skywalker saga and greatest Jedi to ever have lived... I was left totally dead and bewildered.  I also failed to understand how the film failed to convert the awesome setups from The Force Awakens. More than a trick has been missed. Tbh I was utterly dissapionted... but as a sci fi fan I thought it was ok.
